original_text: I looked up again, and there before me were four chariots coming out from between two mountains—mountains of bronze.
korean_text: 내가 또 눈을 들어 본즉 네 병거가 두 산 사이에서 나오는데 그 산은 구리 산이더라

sentences.original_text: and there before me were four chariots
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 앞에 네 개의 전차가 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: coming out from between two mountains
